# pyHappyOrNot

A wrapper around the HappyOrNot API.

## Installation

`pip install pyHappyOrNot`

## Usage

``` python
import pyHappyOrNot
r = pyHappyOrNot.pyHappyOrNot.HappyOrNot()
print(r.results)
```

## API

`results`: A JSON object of Folders

`getJSON()`: A JSON object of Folders including Survey Results
